form.label: Zeek SNMP (V1.0)
form.description: V1 Additions: First generation of dashboard

search.query: index= sourcetype="zeek:snmp:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | stats count

index= sourcetype="zeek:snmp:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | fillnull value="-" display_string | stats count by community, src_ip, dest_ip, display_string | where like (community, "public") AND !like (display_string, "-") | rename community AS Community, src_ip AS "Source IP", dest_ip AS "Destination IP", display_string AS "Display String"

index= sourcetype="zeek:snmp:json" NOT [| inputlookup Known_Scanners.csv | rename scannerip AS id.orig_h | table id.orig_h | format] | fillnull value="-" display_string | stats count by community, src_ip, dest_ip, display_string | where !like (community, "public") | rename community AS Community, src_ip AS "Source IP", dest_ip AS "Destination IP", display_string AS "Display String"
